title: Relaxed Beachside Family Escape 30 Minutes from Coffs Harbour with Waterfront Cabins & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description: Take the whole family to enjoy relaxed beachside living, with a flowing river, sparkling lagoon and thriving rainforest all on your doorstep at Ingenia Holidays White Albatross. Unwind as you please in self-contained, waterfront cabins, complete with modern kitchens, or grab a bite to eat at the casual on-site cafe and restaurant. Wander down to to the surf just two-minutes from the resort, or stay closer to home and float in the sparkling swimming pool while the klds play at the splash park, playground or jumping pad. Take a moment off relaxing to explore the region, from exhilarating bushwalks and quiant towns, to tranquil fishing trips and museum visits.
offer_address: 52 Wellington Drive, Nambucca Heads, New South Wales 2448, Australia
